metadata.methodology: Manual analysis of causal chains, feedback loops, and thematic relationships across technological, social, economic, environmental, security, and infrastructure domains. Economic category connections completed 2025-11-22.

connectedTo.reasoning: Social media addiction directly drives teen depression, anxiety, and suicide rates through dopamine manipulation, social comparison, and cyberbullying
Both driven by same platform business models optimizing for engagement over wellbeing; each success metric worsens the other
Addictive algorithms amplify rage-inducing misinformation to maximize engagement; users can't break away despite knowing content is false
Platform addiction creates 24/7 mob dynamics where users participate in outrage cycles for dopamine hits
Screen addiction during critical developmental years causes permanent neurological changes, depression, and suicide ideation
AI displaces stable jobs first, forcing workers into gig platforms with no benefits or stability
Degrees become worthless as AI replaces knowledge workers, leaving graduates with unpayable debt and no career prospects
Mass unemployment from AI automation makes UBI politically inevitable, triggering fierce implementation battles
Loss of purpose and identity from automated work drives depression, suicide, and rage-based violence
AI hiring systems create feedback loops that exclude displaced workers from remaining jobs
The irony of coders being replaced by their own AI creations drives specific mental health crisis among tech workers
Perfect deepfakes make all visual evidence suspect, accelerating epistemic collapse where no one can trust anything
Deepfake technology directly enables false flag operations between nations, triggering military responses
Deepfake porn creation becomes trivial, weaponizing intimate imagery against millions without consent
When courts cannot verify evidence authenticity, legal systems collapse into power-based rather than truth-based adjudication
Deepfakes force complete redesign of evidence systems with blockchain/cryptographic verification
Massive data centers require enormous water for cooling, directly competing with agriculture and drinking water in drought regions
Data centers' insatiable energy demand drives renewable projects that locals resist; compute needs override community opposition
Compute export controls fragment AI development geopolitically; nations hoard chips and restrict cross-border training
GPU/TPU shortages concentrate power in TSMC/ASML/Nvidia; nations treat chips as strategic weapons
AI training runs consume electricity equivalent to small countries, undermining decarbonization goals
Data center load crashes regional grids when utilities prioritize AI over residential customers
Data localization laws prevent cross-border AI training; compute nationalism fragments global innovation
Both represent technological sovereignty battles; nations copy China's internet control model
App store blocking and cloud seizures trigger retaliatory tariffs and economic decoupling
Splinternet enables nations to enforce local content controls without foreign platform interference
Data localization laws trigger cat-and-mouse game with VPN users trying to bypass restrictions
Speculation drives prices beyond affordability; bubble pops but prices stay high due to supply constraints
When median income cannot afford median housing, tent cities explode and violent clearances escalate
Homeowners block new construction to protect property values; housing shortage worsens; violence against NIMBYs increases
Private equity buys housing during crises, converting ownership to permanent rentership
Boomers' housing wealth comes directly from pricing out millennials/Gen-Z; creates generational conflict
Cannot afford housing means cannot afford children; economic impossibility drives demographic crisis

Data centers and agriculture compete for same scarce aquifers; tech wins, farms die
Scarcity enables corporate water monopolies to charge ransom prices for desalinated supply
Agricultural collapse from water shortage forces mass rural-to-urban migration
Glacier melt eliminates dry-season water for 2 billion people in Asia, triggering international water conflicts
Water scarcity crashes agricultural yields, driving food prices to riot-inducing levels
Scarcity causes upstream nations to violate water-sharing treaties, triggering downstream military responses

Mass unemployment destroys purpose and identity, triggering despair-driven suicide waves
